title: Mordekaiser AP
body: why does he go ap? why not ad and why do people not play him.

replies.body:
Because most of his abilities are AP based and they scale pretty well with AP into the late game. it makes sense to build AP over AD you get so much more. AD is meh. The downfall and the reason he isn't played a heap in his current state is that he is too easy to shut down, he has no escape (except {{summoner:4}}) and has low mobility. He is a situational pick.

he needs to be up close to deal damage. he gets bullied down too hard from kite and ranged especially. 

I'm looking forward to seeing the rework on him hopefully it will put him in a great spot in the meta again.
In reference to why he goes AP, because his scalings are stupid high, as for why no one plays him, because he's garbage in almost all bar niche matches
